  1. AUGUSTA NEWS
    See What's Happening in the County

  1. 2019 Annual Assessment Notices – Richmond County Board of Assessors

    The mailing date for annual assessment notices is Friday, April 19, 2019. Property owners have 45 days from this date to appeal the assessment for Digest Year 2019. The appeal period ends June 03, 2019. Read on...

  2. Augusta Cyber & Robotics Camp

    Augusta's Information Technology Department is sponsoring a Cyber & Robotics Camp this summer. The camp aims to target middle school students by stimulating an interest in the growing field of cyber security and robotics. For more information, click here...

  3. Earth Day Augusta 2019

    Earth Day Augusta will be held on April 27, 2019 at the Phinizy Swamp Nature Park. For more information, Click here...

  4. The April 16, 2019 Commission Meeting is Now Available On Demand

    The April 16, 2019 Commission Meeting is now available on demand for viewing. Click the following link to view it. On Demand...

  5. The March 26, 2019 Committee Meeting is Now Available On Demand

    The March 26, 2019 Committee Meeting is now available on demand for viewing. Click the following link to view it. On Demand...
